name.description: The name of the Application Gateway. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to the Application Gateway should exist. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: The Azure region where the Application Gateway should exist. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

backend_address_pool.description: One or more `backend_address_pool` blocks as defined below.

backend_http_settings.description: One or more `backend_http_settings` blocks as defined below.

frontend_ip_configuration.description: One or more `frontend_ip_configuration` blocks as defined below.

frontend_port.description: One or more `frontend_port` blocks as defined below.

gateway_ip_configuration.description: One or more `gateway_ip_configuration` blocks as defined below.

http_listener.description: One or more `http_listener` blocks as defined below.

request_routing_rule.description: One or more `request_routing_rule` blocks as defined below.

zones.description: A collection of availability zones to spread the Application Gateway over.
